definition.name: NXfabrication
definition.doc: Details about a component as defined by its manufacturer.

field.name: model
field.doc: Version or model of the component named by the manufacturer.

field.name: identifier
field.doc: Ideally, (globally) unique persistent identifier, i.e. a serial number or hash identifier of the component.

field.name: capability
field.doc: Free-text list with eventually multiple terms of functionalities which the component offers.
